main event: A civilian observed a UFO with red and white blinking lights rotating in a circular pattern for 4 minutes and 20 seconds in Westport, Connecticut.
interesting points: The observer described the object as having numerous red and white blinking lights., The lights seemed to rotate in a circular pattern and were similar to an airplane's behavior., No noise was heard during the observation despite the extensive time duration., The observer estimated the object's speed at 1,500 MPH and its distance at about 1/2 mile., The observer noted the condition of the sky but did not provide specific weather details during the sighting.
sighted object: one unidentified flying object with blinking lights
witness description: a civilian who observed the UFO
